content: Custom filter is enabled for this table. Users who opened the file will be able to personalize the data display in the table.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a tooltip explaining that custom filters are enabled for a table, allowing users who opened the file to personalize data display. It appears as a popup or tooltip on the "Custom Filter" button, guiding users on how to use this feature effectively. Translators should focus on conveying the core idea of enabling custom filtering for tables in their respective languages.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "Ֆայլը" (File-ը) is misspelled. It should be "Ֆայլը" (File-ը).
The phrase "անհատականացնել տվյալների ցուցադրումը" can be slightly improved for better flow and clarity. A more natural phrasing would emphasize the ability to customize the data display.

The phrase "個人用に設定できます" (kojin you ni settei dekimasu) translates to 'can set for personal use' which is slightly awkward. A more natural translation of 'personalize' would be something like 「自分好みにカスタマイズできます」 (jibun kodami ni customization dekimasu) or 「自分なりに調整できます」(jibun nari ni chousei dekimasu).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: このテーブルではカスタムフィルターが有効です。ファイルを開いたユーザーは、テーブル内のデータ表示を自分好みにカスタマイズできます。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ເອກະສານ' (ekasan) which means 'document' is used. While technically correct, 'ເອກະສານ' is more formal than 'ເອກະສານ' fits in this context. A more appropriate word for 'file' would be something like 'ຂໍ້ມູນ' (khomun - data) or 'ໄຟລ໌' (fai) directly borrowed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing 'ເອກະສານ' with 'ຂໍ້ມູນ' or 'ໄຟລ໌'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The provided translation is in Slovenian, not Sinhala. The English text refers to 'Custom filter' which implies a feature allowing user personalization. The Slovenian translation, while grammatically correct, doesn't convey the meaning of 'custom filter' as it is used in the English context. It translates literally to 'Custom filter is enabled'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: This requires a complete retranslation into Sinhala. A possible Sinhala translation could be: 'මෙය සඳහා වෙනම ෆිල්ටරය ක්‍රියාත්මක කර ඇත. ෆයිල් විවෘත කරන ලද පරිශීලකයින්ට මේසාවෙහි ඇති දත්ත ප්‍රදර්ශනය තිරසාරුවට සැකසීමේ හැකියාව ලැබේ.' (This translates to 'A custom filter is enabled for this. Users who opened the file will be able to customize the data display in the table.')

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'personalize' is translated as 'персонализују'. While technically correct, a more natural and common Serbian translation would be 'прилагоде' or 'направе по свом укусу'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Корисници који су отворили датотеку моћи ће да прилагоде приказ података у табели.
